LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipAttackPowerModifier: Modify the damage dealt by this animal's attacks Values greater than 1 increase damage and damager per second Values less than 1 decrease damage and damage per second
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipAttackPowerModifierGlobal: Modify the damage dealt by all animals Values greater than 1 increase damage and damager per second Values less than 1 decrease damage and damage per second
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipAttackCooldownModifier: Modify the cooldown of this animal's attacks Values greater than 1 increase the cooldown, reducing the damager per second Values less than 1 decrease the cooldown, increasing the damage per second
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipAttackCooldownModifierGloba: Modify the cooldown of all animal's attacks Values greater than 1 decrease attack speed and damager per second Values less than 1 increase attack speed and damage per second
